sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import useFetch from 'hooks/useFetch' import UserArticles from 'pages/userProfile/components/userArticles' const UserProfile = ({match, location}) => { const slug = match.params.slug const apiUrl = `/profiles/${slug}` console.log(slug) const [{response}, doFetch] = useFetch(apiUrl) useEffect(() => { doFetch() }, [doFetch]) if (!response) { return null } return (

{response.profile.username}

{response.profile.bio}

  • My Posts
  • Favorites Posts
  • Contacts
) } export default UserProfile
